title: Why don't K-Pop artists get Grammy Awards? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh, give it a year or two LOL It will be happening, if only cause ARMYs want it to, and they are no joke.Online stores are carrying KPop now, BTS is set to have ANOTHER album hit the top of the Billboard charts, and there are tons of little American fangirls here. I predict the next Grammy Awards will see BTS nominated, at the very least…. EDIT: Some ‘experts’ claim that it won’t happen because the Grammy’s are exclusive and snooty towards boybands, citing Bieber & One Direction. Well, Bieber I fully understand LOL Not sure about the other group (ie whether they really wrote their own stuff, etc).But BTS does indeed write most of their own music and creates their own concepts, as do several other KPop groups now.
